name: Dispersio
description: Dispersio is a retro-styled action platformer. As you progress through the game, you will have to use and combine special abilities, such as dashing, wall-jumping and more. There's even a hard mode for hardcore players.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Storage: 64 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I want to point out that I'm probably bias since I'm knowing the developer and help maintain the C++ library that was used to build this game.  I have quite a passion for platformer games, yet I'm not the best at it and rather enjoy some more casual platformers. Dispersio falls for me a bit in the middle of both casual and precision platformers. If the game were too 'hardcore' I would have never gotten as far, yet I had struggled in quite a few rooms, because the timing has to be extremly precise.  But honestly if you like retro looking games or just like platformers this game with the given price is a no brainer. You get multiple hours of entertainment for just one buck!
